name: Vanguard
description: class that allows you to deploy Operators more quickly

name: Guard
description: class that deals high melee damage

name: Defender
description: class with high HP and defense

name: Specialist
description: class that utilizes versatile ways to attack

name: Caster

name: Supporter
description: class that provides various support powers
